```{r, include=FALSE}
mdl_ls<-readRDS("../../../../../../../Data/R_Format/Utility_Models/PHQ9_GSN_LOG.RDS")

                                       tfmn_fn = ifelse(identical(fn,fit_gsn_log_lnk),

                                                        function(x){1-exp(-exp(x))})) %>%
  stats::setNames(c("A","B","C"))

```
